issue.title: [CF 1168] Can't get unit speed to work
issue.body:
I am trying to make an event condition for Sniper Training (MM hunter ability) that only triggers if the duration is less than 3.5 seconds AND I am moving.

So far I have this

Buff duration / player / <= 3.5 seconds - buff sniper training - only cast by me

Also I have tried Unit Speed / player > 0

Now the problem is no matter what I set for unit speed or how I move it up or down the ocnditionals, it fires wrong.

I do not want the trigger to fire (a text notification) if I stop moving before the buff duration falls below 3.5 seconds but to trigger if I am still moving at < 3.5 seconds.

Currently it will trigger the text notification even if I stop moving before that 3.5 seconds is up.

I can't get this. I can either get it to work if I am standing still and it hits < 3.5 seconds or trigger as soon as the buff duration starts ticking.

I even tried adding a condition for sniper training: recently moved but it won't work.

so in summary, I want the event conditional for the hunter buff Sniper Training to only fire a text message IF I am moving AND the duration is less than 3.5 seconds. If it is greater than 3.5 seconds and i am not moving DO NOT trigger.


> Posted by CurseForge user transitbus | Imported from CurseForge issue #1168 | Raw
